about.details:
Incorporated in 1992, ASL Industries Ltd is engaged in the business of manufacturing of forged products and press shop for Sheet Metal, Light & Medium Fabrication, Forging and Machined Components, specializing in Assemblies & Sub-Asemblie. Their products have varied applications and are used in various industries like railway, defense and automobile.

ASL's existing unit has a machine shop for the rough & finish machining of components, heat treatment facilities, in-house die making facilities, CNC & VMC horizontal and vertical centres, light, medium & heavy fabrication, assembly and sheet metal press shop. They provide metal forming to assembly under one roof along with logistics and just-in-time solutions. They manufactures both standardized as well as customized products as per customer demand and requirement.

They are OEMs to many Automobiles Companies like Tata Motors Ltd, York Transport Equipment India Ltd – Pune, Jost India Auto component Pvt Ltd etc and Other Engineering Companies like Tata Steel, and also registered with ICF, DGS&D and DGOS.

contactDetails.full_address: ASL Industries Ltd, 7B, Punwani Chambers, Kiran Shankar Roy Road

faqs.question: What is the ASL Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
ASL Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 2800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹35 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on March 31, 2017, and closes on April 7, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in ASL Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in ASL Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in ASL Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in ASL Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'ASL Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When ASL Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The ASL Industries IPO opens on March 31, 2017 and closes on April 7, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of ASL Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: ASL Industries IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,40,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for ASL Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in ASL Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
